config-rpm.script:
# set some convenience variables sshdir=/root/.ssh pubkey=$sshdir/id_rsa.pub authkeys=$sshdir/authorized_keys
# make sshdir if it doesn't exist [[ -d $sshdir ]] || mkdir $sshdir
# create authorized_keys file if it doesn't exist [[ -f $authkeys ]] || touch $authkeys
# copy id_rsa into authorized keys if it's not there already [[ `cat $authkeys` == *`cat $pubkey`* ]] || cat $pubkey >> $authkeys
# set permissions chmod 700 $sshdir chmod 600 $authkeys
